document.full_text: the u.s. offshore drilling regulator is weighing options for expanding oversight of rig contractors after last year's massive bp plc oil spill exposed a possible regulatory gap, interior official michael bromwich said on tuesday.
document.title: government weighs more drilling contractor oversight
lines_and_colors: the u.s. offshore drilling regulator is weighing options for expanding oversight of rig contractors after last year's massive bp plc oil spill exposed a possible regulatory gap, interior official michael bromwich said on tuesday.
